description:
After a decade of exploring Canada's different provinces, our respect for our vast territory has grown steadily. The Canadian Icons Hoodie for Men is an ode to the nature we've been lucky enough to explore on our adventures from east to west.

Made with the environment in mind, our hoodie is made from 100% organic cotton. The ultimate comfort and softness to wind down around the fire after a big day of canoeing, hiking or fly-fishing.

Illustrated by Alex L'Heureux, the back print will take you on a journey with the emblematic Ontario's Canada geese, Prince Edward Island's impressive cliffs, Gaspé's must-see Rocher Percé, New Brunswick's prolific lobster fishery, British Columbia's majestic bald eagle, Alberta's mythic elk, and Newfoundland's iconic moose.
name: Hooke Jumping Deer Pullover Hoodie - Mens
